Instance.description: Structure containing a Getaway Challenge preset that can be used on CustomSchedules when they are used as a Getaway.

Tunable.name: display_name
Tunable.description: The challenge will display in the UI with this string.

TunableList.name: groups
TunableList.description: A single challenge may apply different behaviors to different roles. A role may only belong to a single group.

TunableList.name: associated_buff
TunableList.description: The list of buffs associated with the role selected by the player.

TunableTuple.description: The buff associated with the role selected by the player. A Sim of Interest requires a unique buff to be identified.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

TunableVariant.name: buff_source
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

TunableList.name: disallowed_ages
TunableList.description: Selected sims in this group must be an allowed age for this challenge to apply. The UI will make weak attempts at enforcing this requirement.

TunableList.name: disallowed_species
TunableList.description: Selected sims in this group must be an allowed species for this challenge to apply. The UI will make weak attempts at enforcing this requirement.

Tunable.name: group_name
Tunable.description: The display name of this group of roles. Used in the UI as a header for each group of roles.

Tunable.name: multi_select
Tunable.description: If True, multiple roles are allowed to be selected. Otherwise only a single role may be selected.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The challenge will display in the UI using this icon.
